text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Perhaps you've made up your mind? "Tachyon-san, in celebration of your birthday, I'll be the subject of your experiment" … Or something.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: …I figured you'd reach that conclusion. I guess that can be your gift… Please don't tell anyone.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ahahahaha! Not only can you see the unseen, but you can also tell the future?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hmmm. The occidental lobe of the brain processes visual information, while the prefrontal cortex works to visualize things.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Those areas of your brain may be more developed than others.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: …The world I see is a "perceived hallucination". Is that…… What you're trying to say?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: No, it means that you have a rare brain that can perceive phenomena that cannot be scientifically proven!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Are you curious about your brain too!? Then let's start with a simple brain fluid test! I'll grab the electrode plates and respirator!!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: …Great. Also, I forgot to mention something.
